detail_desc: Sleeveless A-line dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an asymmetric hem with overlocked edges.
Washed cotton twill chinos in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Tapered fit.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a high waist and raw-edge hems.
Round metal earrings with sparkly stones. Diameter 3 cm.
Sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and two tiers to the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, slub cotton jersey with an appliqué on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with concealed buttons at the top and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist with decorative straps and round metal fasteners at the front. Lined skirt.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.

Tops in soft cotton jersey, one printed and one in a solid colour. Scalloped neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and short, scallop-trimmed sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, front and back pockets and a fake fly with a press-stud.
Pattern-weave trousers with a high, paper bag waist, tie belt, zip fly, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Espadrilles in cotton canvas with a braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Pool shoes with an imitation leather foot strap covered in sturdy jersey with a plastic print. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.

Briefs in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Trousers in imitation leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs.
Leggings in soft, superstretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapering legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif. Round neckline, short sleeves, and rounded and longer at the back.

Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed section over the foot and slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum fit. Reinforced heel and toe for perfect, friction-free comfort.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit with long dolman sleeves, close-fitting cuffs and a rounded hem. No buttons.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Classic T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and short slits in the sides.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a yoke with concealed pleats at the back, and side pockets.
Two iron-on fabric patches to patch and repair garments. Size approx. 12 cm.
Trousers in wide-wale organic cotton corduroy with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Double-layered hats in soft cotton jersey.
Sandals with toe and foot straps in grained imitation leather. Moulded imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved Henley top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, leggings and hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide foldover ribbing at the waist.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with frayed, raw-edge hems.
Longer cardigan in a soft knit with a faux fur-trimmed hood and buttons down the front. Side pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Metal keyring with a carabiner hook and shimmering imitation leather pendant.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Ankle-length dress in a cotton weave with lace details, a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam under the bust with pleats and a lace trim, and a seam at the hem with a lace trim and wide, pleated flounce. Lined bodice and a short inner skirt.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and lace-trimmed hems.
Gently tailored, double-breasted pea coat in felted fabric with notch lapels and welt side pockets. Lined.
Jacquard-patterned chiffon blouse in a straight cut with a collar, concealed fasteners at the front and cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with one side in soft faux fur. Zip at the top and an imitation leather shoulder strap with a chain at either end. Satin lining. Size approx. 15x19 cm.
Short crushed velvet shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, pleats at the front and side pockets.

Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a yoke at the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Flap chest pocket with a tab and plastic fastener, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections on the shoulders, cuffs and at the back of the hem. Small stand-up collar, diagonal zip at the front and zipped side pockets. Lined.
T-shirt in fine-knit slub cotton with a round neck and gently dropped shoulders. Roll edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Pleated yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in woven fabric with a silicone trim and plastic stays at the top for support and narrow, detachable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, a concealed zip in one side and straight, wide, 3/4-length legs. Lined at the top.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Knee-length dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a round neckline, concealed button placket and ties at the top. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with a concealed button at the top. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jacket in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with a large appliqué on the back. Collar, press-studs down the front, fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Large scarf in a soft, patterned weave with fringes along the short sides.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Blouse in a cotton weave with sparkly stone embroidery on the shoulders, an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with pleats at the top.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in twill. Loose fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a wide neckline, long dolman sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Joggers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping viscose satin with a sheen. High waist with concealed elastication, a concealed zip in one side, and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.

Set with a cotton jersey T-shirt and pair of denim shorts. T-shirt with an all-over print and ribbed trim around the neckline. Shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular, adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and slim legs. Slim fit.
Oversized, padded jacket in woven fabric with a padded hood and concealed press-studs down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and side pockets. Lined.
A pair of metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic rhinestones in various colours.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Blouse in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with inset lace trims and a flounce at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with a regular waist and super-skinny legs.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap jetted front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with elastication, and a zip fly with buttons. Side pockets and wide legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sandals in imitation leather with cork wedge heels. Twisted rope straps over the foot and ankle and a wide ankle strap with an adjustable fastener. Smooth soles. Heel 8 cm. Platform 4.5 cm.
Swim top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, stand-up collar and raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Fully lined swimsuit with a glitter print on the front and narrow shoulder straps.
Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and a small embroidery detail at the hem.
Swim cap with a peak at the front and a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck.
Espadrilles in fabric and braided jute with crossover straps at the front that tie around the ankle. Fabric linings, jute insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
